level.heading: Effective date.
level.text: The provisions of this chapter shall apply only to violations which occur after the Director has promulgated the necessary regulations to carry out this chapter pursuant to § 50-2301.07.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-104
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-2301.01.
